info.title: Shipment API
info.description:
This API allows you to create and track shipments through the Cosmo Cargo platform.

## Authentication
All endpoints require a valid API key passed in the `X-API-Key` header.

tags.name: Shipment Management
tags.description: Endpoints for creating, tracking, updating, and managing shipments.

tags.name: Rates & Billing
tags.description: Endpoints related to calculating shipping rates, billing, and insurance.

tags.name: International Shipping
tags.description: Operations for managing customs documentation, duties, and international shipment processes.

tags.name: Documentation
tags.description: Endpoints for generating and retrieving shipment-related documents.

tags.name: Tracking & Notifications
tags.description: Endpoints for tracking shipments and configuring notifications for shipment status updates.

tags.name: System
tags.description: Endpoints for system health checks and retrieving API version information.

tags.name: Schemas
tags.description: Endpoints for retrieving and validating data schemas used across the Cosmo Cargo platform.

CorrelationId.name: X-Correlation-ID
CorrelationId.description: Unique identifier for tracking requests across multiple services

IdempotencyKey.name: Idempotency-Key
IdempotencyKey.description: Unique key to ensure idempotency of the request

ApiVersion.name: X-API-Version
ApiVersion.description: API version requested by the client

customData.description: Array of custom data items that can be of any type

customFields.description: Dictionary of custom string fields that can be added to the shipment

facilityCapabilities.description: Dictionary of facility capabilities and their status

lastChecked.description: When the capability was last verified

Comment.description: A comment on a shipment that can have nested replies

author.description: Name of the person who wrote the comment

Organization.description: A shipping organization that can have sub-organizations (e.g. regional offices)

parent.description: The parent organization (direct object circular reference)

LinkedShipment.description: A shipment that's part of a chain (e.g. multi-leg delivery)

SchemaValidationRequest.description: Request to validate data against a specific schema

data.description: The data to validate against the schema

strictMode.description: Whether to validate in strict mode

allowAdditionalProperties.description: Whether to allow properties not defined in the schema

valid.description: Whether the data is valid according to the schema

path.description: JSON path to the invalid property

schemaId.description: Identifier of the schema used for validation

updatedAt.description: When the schema was last updated

spaceEntityType.description: The type of space entity this schema represents

get.description: Check if the API is up and running
Get information about the current API version

post.description: Creates a new shipment with the provided details

parameters.name: X-Request-Priority
parameters.description: Priority level for processing the shipment request

get.description: Get the current status and tracking information for a shipment

parameters.name: X-Cache-Control
parameters.description: Caching behavior for the tracking response

parameters.name: includeHistory
parameters.description: Include detailed tracking history and events in the response

example.message: Shipment with tracking number SH123456789 not found

delete.description: Cancel a shipment that hasn't been picked up yet

put.description: Place a shipment on hold at a facility

recipient_request.summary: Hold at facility per recipient request

post.description: Calculate available shipping rates for a shipment based on service level, destination, and package details

value.description: Declared value for insurance in USD

insured.description: Express shipping with insurance for high-value electronics

post.description: Add or modify insurance coverage for a shipment

put.description: Update or add customs documentation for international shipments

parameters.name: X-Customs-Region
parameters.description: Customs processing region for the shipment

gift.description: Handmade items sent as a gift

post.description: Pay import duties and taxes for an international shipment

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available data schemas in the Cosmo Cargo platform

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: Filter schemas by space entity type

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific schema, including its structure

parameters.name: includeStructure
parameters.description: Whether to include the full schema structure

manifestId.description: Unique identifier for the cargo manifest

vesselId.description: ID of the vessel carrying the cargo

get.description: Get the shipping label for a shipment in various formats. Supports both JSON and XML responses. XML format follows the EDIFACT D96A standard for shipping label interchange, while JSON is provided for modern API integrations.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Response format. Use application/xml for EDI-compliant responses following EDIFACT D96A standard.

zpl.description: Label in ZPL format for direct thermal printing

pdf.description: Label response in EDIFACT D96A XML format for EDI compliance

png.description: Label response in EDIFACT D96A XML format for EDI compliance

zpl.description: Label response in EDIFACT D96A XML format for EDI compliance, suitable for thermal printers

get.description: Generate an enhanced commercial invoice with digital signatures, multiple format support, and customs pre-clearance capabilities. Supports both standard formats and country-specific templates.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Document format. XML/EDI formats follow international customs standards.

get.description: Generate a basic commercial invoice for an international shipment. This endpoint is deprecated, please use [`/shipments/{shipmentId}/documents/v2/commercial-invoice`](#get-commercial-invoice) for enhanced features including digital signatures, multiple formats, and customs pre-clearance.
Retrieve detailed tracking events for a shipment

post.description: Configure notification preferences for shipment status updates

put.description: Update the priority level of a shipment

priority.description: New priority level for the shipment

get.description: Get all available service levels for a shipment with their details
Returns a list of all organizations in the hierarchy

post.description: Creates a new organization, optionally as part of an existing hierarchy

get.description: Get estimated delivery time between two facilities for a specific service level

example.message: No route found between specified facilities

get.description: Retrieve detailed capability information for space cargo facilities, including their operational status and supported features

parameters.name: facilityIds
parameters.description: Array of facility IDs to test

200.description: Test response with array and nullable types
